document.masterDocTitle: New genera, species and records of Maeridae from Australian Waters: Austromaera, Ceradocus, Glossomaera, Hamimaera, Huonella gen. nov., Linguimaera and Maeraceterus gen. nov. (Crustacea: Amphipoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New genera, species and records of Maeridae from Australian Waters: Austromaera, Ceradocus, Glossomaera, Hamimaera, Huonella gen. nov., Linguimaera and Maeraceterus gen. nov. (Crustacea: Amphipoda)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Maera rubromaculata
.—

, pl. 10, fig. 4.—

.—

, pl. 15, figs 5–12 (in part).

Ceradocus rubromaculatus
.—

(in part).—

(in part).—S tebbing, 1910a: 598.—

.—

, pl. 14.—

.—

.—

).

by Chilton, 1921 ).— K.H. Barnard, 1937 ; 160, fig. 9.—

caption.paragraph:

Ceradocus rubromaculatus (Stimpson, 1856)
, male, habitus, 6.0 mm, AM P.92253, Fig Valley Reef, Norfolk Island.

Ceradocus rubromaculatus (Stimpson, 1856)

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality.
Port Jackson ,
New South Wales
( 33º51′S 151°16′E ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution.
Norfolk Island
(current study). Australia .
New South Wales
: Norah Head; Newcastle ; Port Stephens; Port Jackson; Port Kembla; Kiama; Merimbula; Eden, Ulladulla; Twofold Bay ( Haswell 1879a ; Sheard 1939 ; current study). Victoria : Port Phillip Bay; Mornington ( J.L. Barnard 1972a; current study ).
South Australia
: Gulf of St Vincent ( Sheard 1939 ). Tasmania : King Island ; Bruny Island ; Freycinet Peninsula (current study).
Western Australia
: Favourite Islands, Cottesloe, Fremantle, Albany, Garden Island , Cockburn Sound, King George Sound; Albrolhos Islands; East Lewis Island , West Lewis Island , Enderby Island , Malus Island , Georgeff Reef, Rosemary Island , Dampier Archipelago; Hearson Cove, Burrup Peninsula ( J.L. Barnard 1972a; current study ).
Northern Territory
. Kakadu National Park, Beagle Gulf (current study). Madagascar ( Ledoyer 1968 ).
